Text.SourceString: EMP grenades don't damage players, but they destroy enemy portals. Press <ACTION NAME="GRENADE" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> to throw a grenade.
Want to trash talk your enemies in game? Press <ACTION NAME="PTT_PROXIMITY" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> to use proximity voice chat!
Stuck at the bottom of the map? Look up and around for a portal wall to get yourself back in the action.
Try looking for a portal wall behind your enemy. If you can teleport behind them, they won't know what hit them!
Keep an eye out for power weapons around the map. They are much more effective in combat than the weapons you start with.
Struggling with portals? Check out the race courses in the Training section of the Play options.
Looking to earn more XP? Try completing a challenge or inviting a friend to earn an XP boost!
Keep an eye out for flashing portals. It means an enemy is on the other side.
Don't forget to use your jetpack! Double tap and hold jump to activate it.
Press <ACTION NAME="MELEE" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> to melee enemies you are close to. Melees do at least 50 damage but scale up with your speed.
If you jump through a portal at high speed, you will come out the other portal at high speed. Use this to get to strategic locations on maps like Highwind and Karman Station!
Hold <ACTION NAME="SPRINT" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> while in the air to gain speed.
You can emote before, after, and during a match. Press <ACTION NAME="PLAYEMOTE" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/>.
If you see a dead body, walk over to it and try crouching repeatedly. Press <ACTION NAME="CROUCH" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> to crouch.
Looking to be more involved in the community or have feedback about the game? Head to discord.gg/splitgate and come say hi!
Want to admire that awesome gun you're carrying? Press <ACTION NAME="INSPECT" WIDTH="40" HEIGHT="60" STRETCH="FILL" PADDING="0 20 0 0"/> to inspect it.
